title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 §§ 28-3.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 §§ 28-3.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart governs the transfer of vacation credits to
eligible employees, as defined herein, for use for absences in connection with
an illness or disability which did not arise in connection with such
individual's employment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
§§
28-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
